base.name: Slice
base.description: This block outputs the a subset of elements extracted from a matrix or vector.

parameter_definitions.name: input_type
parameter_definitions.description: The type of the input to extract a slice from

parameter_definitions.name: row
parameter_definitions.description: The row indices to extract. Supports comma separated list of ranges.

parameter_definitions.name: column
parameter_definitions.description: The column indices to extract. Supports comma separated list of ranges.

parameter_definitions.name: index
parameter_definitions.description: The indices to extract. Supports comma separated list of ranges.
